businessProfile.name: Tony & Alba‚Äôs Pizza and Pasta
businessProfile.address: 3137 Stevens Creek Blvd, San Jose, CA 95117, USA

reviews.text: The food here is very good‚Ä¶ the salad was nice and the pasta Fungi was amazing! But what really made this restaurant stand out was the management and staff! Everyone went above and beyond to welcome my son and I , explaining the menu, asking if we had ever eaten here before and really making us feel like part of the family. The owner ( I‚Äôm horrible with names ) showed my 8 year old son all of the Lego displays, showed him some card magic tricks and even gave him some chocolate chip cookies for dessert! Needless to say my son is a fan of Tony & Alba‚Äôs now and so am I! Very impressed üëç

Passing by otw to Guitar Center I kept seeing this $6 Pizza slice + drink combo and finally I did it.

In fact - I did TWO! Lol.

Although she didn't quite understand I wanted the deal x2 but just one drink (slice + fountain $6 slice $6.25, .25 more than two combos) what's a quarter for a good deal!

Not sure if something happened as I ended up getting FOUR SLICES

I assume they wanted to ensure the slices were up to their standards or it was my lucky day.

Super friendly staff. It seemed they had a few regulars dining in and each time I'm here I feel like I walked into my neighborhood pizza shop, like where everyone knows your name.

Great spot - pls support if you visit Santa row or Valley Fair. They have more personality and heart than most places I've worked at or dined in at at those large malls.

We reached here almost during their closing time and we could only order their pizzas and only outdoor dining was available. The interiors of this place are cute and they had a lot of Lego decor and games available .The staff  here was very friendly and service was  quick. This place is more of a family run restaurant and overall we had a good experience here.

I‚Äôve grabbed a slice from here before, and it was good‚Ä¶. But this time was especially unique!

I was stopping by UPS to drop off a package‚Ä¶ (I park far because I just got my first new car) and there was a disabled man in the parking lot asking for some money to eat. I didn‚Äôt have cash, but offered to buy him a slice. There was a kind lady that greeted me at the door and I told her I wanted to buy him a slice and she offered to give him one.

Extremely sweet, and very generous! There was a sign at the door saying something about changing the world‚Ä¶ they honored that.

I‚Äôll probably always remember this gesture‚Ä¶

Fairly quick from ordering to taking our order home. Not super busy at 4pm.  We always enjoy their food. And they are always willing to adjust our order to fit our taste. Such as adding extra meat balls or doing gluten-free pasta. Everyone is very friendly & helpful.

editorial_summary.overview: Italian comfort food is served in hearty portions made for sharing in a down-to-earth setting.

recentReviews.text:
Such a great place! We love the food and service.

I love that there are board games you can play while waiting.

This place is amazing. So beautiful and stunning since the moment you get there, then you taste the food and is another level of deliciousness in every bite. They have great packages and excellent attention. We will definitely come back.
So so welcoming you just enjoy being there and the food is no less I give it a solid ten

The food here is very good‚Ä¶ the salad was nice and the pasta Fungi was amazing! But what really made this restaurant stand out was the management and staff! Everyone went above and beyond to welcome my son and I , explaining the menu, asking if we had ever eaten here before and really making us feel like part of the family. The owner ( I‚Äôm horrible with names ) showed my 8 year old son all of the Lego displays, showed him some card magic tricks and even gave him some chocolate chip cookies for dessert! Needless to say my son is a fan of Tony & Alba‚Äôs now and so am I! Very impressed üëç

LOVE this place, I'm here once or twice a week...the low carb chicken with spinach & cheese is my fave...veggie pizza is laden with veggies! Always get a LARGE cannoli!üòÉüòÑüòÜ
Garlic knots (bread) is so good, especially love with (meat or cheese) raviolis!!!

Fairly quick from ordering to taking our order home. Not super busy at 4pm.  We always enjoy their food. And they are always willing to adjust our order to fit our taste. Such as adding extra meat balls or doing gluten-free pasta. Everyone is very friendly & helpful.

My wife and I have been coming here for at least 25 years and we love it.
The owners and staff are really good people.

detailedReviews.author: Debra Reyes
detailedReviews.text:
Such a great place! We love the food and service.

I love that there are board games you can play while waiting.

detailedReviews.author: Medusa
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing. So beautiful and stunning since the moment you get there, then you taste the food and is another level of deliciousness in every bite. They have great packages and excellent attention. We will definitely come back.

detailedReviews.author: Eleanor Zafran
detailedReviews.text: So so welcoming you just enjoy being there and the food is no less I give it a solid ten

detailedReviews.author: Santa Clara Cycle Accessories
detailedReviews.text: The food here is very good‚Ä¶ the salad was nice and the pasta Fungi was amazing! But what really made this restaurant stand out was the management and staff! Everyone went above and beyond to welcome my son and I , explaining the menu, asking if we had ever eaten here before and really making us feel like part of the family. The owner ( I‚Äôm horrible with names ) showed my 8 year old son all of the Lego displays, showed him some card magic tricks and even gave him some chocolate chip cookies for dessert! Needless to say my son is a fan of Tony & Alba‚Äôs now and so am I! Very impressed üëç

detailedReviews.author: Lynda Martinez
detailedReviews.text:
LOVE this place, I'm here once or twice a week...the low carb chicken with spinach & cheese is my fave...veggie pizza is laden with veggies! Always get a LARGE cannoli!üòÉüòÑüòÜ
Garlic knots (bread) is so good, especially love with (meat or cheese) raviolis!!!

detailedReviews.author: Veronica Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Love pizza

detailedReviews.author: Patty Shook
detailedReviews.text: Fairly quick from ordering to taking our order home. Not super busy at 4pm.  We always enjoy their food. And they are always willing to adjust our order to fit our taste. Such as adding extra meat balls or doing gluten-free pasta. Everyone is very friendly & helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Phil Marcus
detailedReviews.text:
My wife and I have been coming here for at least 25 years and we love it.
The owners and staff are really good people.

detailedReviews.author: Barb Ram
detailedReviews.text: The food was delicious, definitely going back, everyone was so friendly

detailedReviews.author: Steve
detailedReviews.text: Got my order slightly wrong. Got 1 cheese. 1 pepperoni slice. End up with 2 pepperoni slices. Daughter didn't get her cheese slice. We had to get McDonald's after for her. But it's ok. The 2 slices were still good as I remember since college. Forgot to tell them I wanted thin crust but. From what I know. This is very old school basic establishment. It's cheese or pepperoni by the slice. The rest is specialty whole pie.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Pandey
detailedReviews.text: I grew up eating Tony & Alba's and the specific taste and zest of their pizza sauce is something I have thought of throughout my life. I remember dining in as a kid enjoying their antipasto and their supreme and pepperoni pizza. No other pizza in my life has matched this. I even used to frequent their Santa Teresa location until it closed. Tony & Alba's and the personal care and family tradition they put into their food has been a memory that has followed me across the globe. If you are curious I recommend you give their pizza shot, it may end up being a good memory for you as well.

detailedReviews.author: zombieeater657
detailedReviews.text: Old school Italian American food fare, very welcoming and the food is great. FYI, the bolognese sauce is to die for.

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Bingham
detailedReviews.text: Simply the best! Best food, best service, best value. Be sure to sign up for their valued customer program. They have the nicest staff ever.  You can tell they are proud of the food they serve and love customers.  We get awesome coupons about once a month.

detailedReviews.author: Colleen Crane
detailedReviews.text: I wish that we could leave more than FIVE stars for Tony & Alba‚Äôs family of employees and their service! Our pizza is ALWAYS the best! LOVE the a la Gilroy pizza!üçï

detailedReviews.author: Karim G
detailedReviews.text: Great spot for a slice of pizza. Very friendly. Love the interior decor. Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Ted Greenwood
detailedReviews.text:
Best authentic (family owned) Italian food in the Bay Area!

Super friendly staff and service at a very fair price.

Best pizza anywhere and the pasta is also amazing!

detailedReviews.author: linda King
detailedReviews.text: Family atmosphere, food is so tasty, they all were so friendly & helpful signing up for text messages

detailedReviews.author: Tobin Shaw
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, friendly service, home-like atmosphere. Been a fan forever.

detailedReviews.author: John Azevedo
detailedReviews.text: Ravioli like your mother made

detailedReviews.author: Deb Gordon
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pasta dishes; hubby had squash ravioli in brown butter sauce and loved it. Healthy choices too like shrimp and spinach which was delicious! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Rafael DeAusen
detailedReviews.text:
Passing by otw to Guitar Center I kept seeing this $6 Pizza slice + drink combo and finally I did it.

In fact - I did TWO! Lol.

Although she didn't quite understand I wanted the deal x2 but just one drink (slice + fountain $6 slice $6.25, .25 more than two combos) what's a quarter for a good deal!

Not sure if something happened as I ended up getting FOUR SLICES

I assume they wanted to ensure the slices were up to their standards or it was my lucky day.

Super friendly staff. It seemed they had a few regulars dining in and each time I'm here I feel like I walked into my neighborhood pizza shop, like where everyone knows your name.

Great spot - pls support if you visit Santa row or Valley Fair. They have more personality and heart than most places I've worked at or dined in at at those large malls.

detailedReviews.author: Shruti Daga
detailedReviews.text: We reached here almost during their closing time and we could only order their pizzas and only outdoor dining was available. The interiors of this place are cute and they had a lot of Lego decor and games available .The staff  here was very friendly and service was  quick. This place is more of a family run restaurant and overall we had a good experience here.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony K.R.
detailedReviews.text: 3 stars would be too generous. Food isn‚Äôt that good. You can definitely find better pasta and pizza elsewhere, and at much better prices.

detailedReviews.author: Caitlin Hattan
detailedReviews.text: Great food always

detailedReviews.author: Vidal Alvarez
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delicious and the atmosphere was great.

detailedReviews.author: DanAndLaura Winter
detailedReviews.text: Great family restaurant.  Amazing pizza, excellent and creative pasta. Craft beers.  And the staff is always friendly.  Al and Diana make us feel like we‚Äôre eating in their home.  And they do so much for the community, its great to have a chance to give back through their RAP and other donation programs!

detailedReviews.author: Natron Jones
detailedReviews.text:
The Best!!!!!!!!
Bellissimo!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: chris finn
detailedReviews.text: The lunch special is a great deal. The pizza tasted great and so did the salad. I will be coming back more often.

detailedReviews.author: Anna C.
detailedReviews.text:
I have been eating at Tony and Albas since 1993 when they were on Santa Teresa and Blossom Hill and even followed them when they moved to Santa Teresa and Snell. I am a big fan of their lunch special and always order their pesto pizza and Italian salad. Their salad dressing is simple yet delicious and is a very good-sized portion. They have  had to raise their prices like everyone else, but the quality and taste of their pizza are still worthy of today's  prices. Over the years, I have been treated extremely well by the staff and never had a complaint. Until, my last visit when I was not treated very well at all.
There was a large group in front of me who were talking their time, deciding what to order, so I sat down  at a table where I was told by a male staff member that I could not sit at a table till I placed my order.  I have a non visible injury, which makes it hard to stand long periods of time. If this is a new policy that they have implemented, I can respect it if it is posted. I felt singled out and  mistreated and was embarrassed. I will not eat there again for how badly I was treated.
I can honestly say their food is good, but the customer service that day was sub-par, considering what a long-time customer I have been.

detailedReviews.author: Mirian Salinas
detailedReviews.text: We love love love this place it‚Äôs like going out but like being in comfort of home and great company too!! üòÅüôåüèΩüçï

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Diep
detailedReviews.text:
great pizza.
super slow service.
ordered on phone and promised in 20 minutes. it too over an hour.

detailedReviews.author: Ron Rivers
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was too salty.

detailedReviews.author: M T
detailedReviews.text: This is the last of the Tony & Alba's, and I believe it's the original.  I love the Tony's Gourmet pizza. I also enjoy the lunch specials. Friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Bhillz34
detailedReviews.text:
I‚Äôve grabbed a slice from here before, and it was good‚Ä¶. But this time was especially unique!

I was stopping by UPS to drop off a package‚Ä¶ (I park far because I just got my first new car) and there was a disabled man in the parking lot asking for some money to eat. I didn‚Äôt have cash, but offered to buy him a slice. There was a kind lady that greeted me at the door and I told her I wanted to buy him a slice and she offered to give him one.

Extremely sweet, and very generous! There was a sign at the door saying something about changing the world‚Ä¶ they honored that.

I‚Äôll probably always remember this gesture‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: Ed Vergara
detailedReviews.text: We have been going here for more than 20 years.

detailedReviews.author: Joanne Olssen
detailedReviews.text: Mom & Pop spot with a warmth that can‚Äôt be faked

detailedReviews.author: Rosa Wilbanks
detailedReviews.text: I love Tony & Alba‚Äôs!!  Not only is the food always great but the service is fabulous.  Everyone that works there is so kind and pleasant!  Highly recommend!!!  üíöü§ç‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: coco A
detailedReviews.text: very nice yummy pizza awesome awesome aweseome

detailedReviews.author: ricardo vizcarra
detailedReviews.text: One of my top 5 Italian Restaurants.  Great pizza, salad, pastas and sandwiches too.  Awsome lunch specials and my all time favorite Chicken Pizzaiola sandwiche is a must try.

detailedReviews.author: Cynthia S
detailedReviews.text: Excellent authentic Italian food!

detailedReviews.author: Ivan Barrera
detailedReviews.text:
Best pasta in town. Here you will find the best Italian mood and food, they will recommend you their best option, the atmosphere is great you have bunch of options to play, read and check while you are waiting, however the waiting is not that long.
Trust me when I say that the pasta is not heavy at all (lactose intolerant speaking). Desserts are great and for the look of the pizzas...they are amazing.
Give it a try guys, you wont regret it.

detailedReviews.author: Ann Weitz
detailedReviews.text: Thought of pizza tonight and immediately thought of Tony & Albas! Love supporting Al and Diana as they love to support the community.

detailedReviews.author: John Bartol
detailedReviews.text: Awesome Family Restaurant... Great Food... Love Tony and Alba's

detailedReviews.author: G EE
detailedReviews.text: They took 10 minutes to help 2 customers ahead of me and told me it will be a few minutes for 2 slices of pizza after 20 minutes when I asked them my order was sitting there. Slices were cold and dry when i got back in my car

Best pie in the South Bay!

Try Tony‚Äôs Gourmet! ü§å

detailedReviews.author: MICROSOFT G
detailedReviews.text: Not Italian food, very bland and not fresh

detailedReviews.author: Trianon Alex
detailedReviews.text: I waited so long to try this place ,when I did ...I was really disappointed. Bad service ,bland food and high prices. Skip this place ,I wish someone would have told me that.

detailedReviews.author: janice ponce
detailedReviews.text: Been coming here for many years. I love this place! Great family atmosphere and Fantastic Food. Outstanding Customer Service

detailedReviews.author: Ginny C
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza I've ever had in my life

detailedReviews.author: Whulia Lewis
detailedReviews.text: Great food. The staff is fun and very helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Neuman
detailedReviews.text:
Tony & Alba's serves delicious pizza and pasta in a comfortable atmosphere with friend staff. My favorite pastas are Alba's Baked Rigatoni and cheese ravioli with Rosa sauce.

Tony & Alba's is a great place to meet  a friend for lunch. They have lunch specials that help you battle inflation.
They have tables outside as well as inside, and there is plenty of parking.
They have takeout as well as dine in.

Tony & Alba's supported the community during the difficult years of the pandemic. I hope you'll support this small but special business.

detailedReviews.author: Peggy Aoki
detailedReviews.text: An old fashioned pizza parlor with real people and friendly service. This is the vintage pizza your parents used to bring home, made by people who care about their community.

detailedReviews.author: Alfie Quintero
detailedReviews.text: Very homey and authentic. The staff is fun and enjoys their customers. Only getting pizza from here now.

detailedReviews.author: Juan Antonio
detailedReviews.text: Love T & A. The one thing I don't like is clicking on the text to order. There is no explanation that once you click on looking at the menu, you then have 1hr (On a timer) to order. Not right, because like I, I just wanted to look at menu and talk to people about what to order and that timer made me not order (Maybe it's just me, but I don't like to be hurried, especially for food.) Otherwise, T&A is great. Been going there for 20 years.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Saban
detailedReviews.text: Great food at good value, always enjoyable!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Mardell
detailedReviews.text: Putanesca is a gem.  One of the best pomodoros in the valley.   Always made to feel like family when i am here.

detailedReviews.author: Jo Co
detailedReviews.text: We had hair in our Alfredo pasta. Service was not good. Was told there was curbside but when picking up order was given a hard time. No napkins, fork plates etc offered or given.

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Oblander
detailedReviews.text: Excellent family establishment!! We love this place! Awesome food!!

detailedReviews.author: Doug Williams
detailedReviews.text: Our go to place! ALWAYS!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Woodhead
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve had a relationship with this business for 30 years. I‚Äôd visited all their locations during their chain period. It has always been consistently the same pizza which is some of the best I‚Äôve ever had. The crust is flaky and chewy. The crust has herbs. The sauce has wine. The toppings are quality, especially the sausage. The cheese has PULL. The front of house people are always friendly. It‚Äôs pricey for pizza but that money is quality at Tony and Alba‚Äôs. May it live forever.

detailedReviews.author: Ken Kramasz
detailedReviews.text: We‚Äôve been enjoying Tony and Albas for almost 30 years.  The food never disappoints. Great pizza (Tonys Special is awesome) and the Italian salad is a perfect side.  Family owned local business.  Strong recommend

detailedReviews.author: Greg West
detailedReviews.text:
I just happened to be by Tony & Albas pizza this afternoon when I remembered I hadn't eaten breakfast or lunch yet. As a regular customer, they had sent me a text for a FREE one-topping Small pizza. Perfect timing, I went in and ordered a small pepperoni pizza and within 10 or so minutes my piping hot pizza was ready.
I've always enjoyed Tony & Albas pizza from way back when I was a kid, it's always been my favorite. Perfect crust, homemade sauce with too much sugar and always quality ingredients. Real cheese that stretches as you take a bite and pepperoni that's better than any other pizza by far. You can taste the quality. Definitely satisfied my hunger. Will continue to patronize this family run establishment for years to come.

detailedReviews.author: Sonia Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Cute place it was a Thursday 2:30 pm but workers weren't very welcoming my friend and I ordered pizza slice combo my pizza my first pizza was old dough was still raw it needs not to be rushed 2 or 3 mins longer my friend took it back they gave us new ones they looked little better but still not cooked I eaten a lot of pizza to know the difference I honestly don't understand the rudeness I seen them ask other ppl were they good I don't know because I'm Mexican my friend Black I honestly won't go back I can't stand rudeness the 3 lady's were more into each other conversation I asked where the bathroom was lady pouring soda ignored me for it being a family restaurant it didn't feel family like but this is why I do this goggle maps so you know I love to eat but I know when it's good service or not you need to be nice whatever race you are im not cheap or poor I even gave a tip they didn't deserve being a Mexican woman how I get treated don't judge I felt very bad eating here I won't come again my friend said the same.

detailedReviews.author: michael tai
detailedReviews.text: Very family friendly service , good place to sit and relax with friends and hang out.

detailedReviews.author: Angela Garbeil
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Excellent service!!

detailedReviews.author: Miriamar
detailedReviews.text: Exquisite homemade pastas. I have never eaten a better pasta in another restaurant. The service is fantastic the owners are very attentive with all the customers. The wait might be long but totally worth it everything is fresh

detailedReviews.author: A M
detailedReviews.text: When I'm not making my own sauce, this Is my Go To place for Awesome Itilian food near me!!!  Diana, Al (the owners) & John, are my most favorite people, but the rest of their staff are quite Awesome as well!!!  Going there tonight for some pasta & pizza!!!  See you there!!!  ; >

detailedReviews.author: Parsa Moinpur
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful pizza with great flavor and taste, and the staff were so kind and lovely, giving us a great experience. And the environment was so great, with super cool and funny decorations everywhere.

detailedReviews.author: Katie Hennessy
detailedReviews.text: Great restaurant close to Winchester Mystery House. Great experience eating here. They're very accommodating with dietary needs for GF dishes. The staff is friendly and creates a welcoming environment. The food was delicious as well! 10/10 would recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Gabriel Brooks
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic! Great restaurant near Winchester Mystery House. Very accommodating to our party member who needs gluten free options. Great customer service, very friendly! We are from out of town but will be back next time we are in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Faith Treiss
detailedReviews.text: THE Italian restaurant. Everything is wonderful here, the food, the service, the atmosphere. The people are so kind and fun. There are games to play at your table, cool things all around to enjoy, and such delicious options. It feels like one of the last great family restaurants. There is so much more I could mention, but I'll just say you should go visit

detailedReviews.author: Ellen Chiantelli
detailedReviews.text:
The food is absolutely delicious.  The staff is super friendly, warm and inviting.  I really feel like I am home in an authentic Italian cucina and part of a wonderful Italian family.   I had the tremendous pleasure of meeting Diana, Leticia and John.
A 5-Star Experience all the way around!

detailedReviews.author: a ‚ÄúHookers on speedial‚Äù gibson
detailedReviews.text:
Tony and Alba‚Äôs never disappoints! I‚Äôve enjoyed their pizza since they were only in Mountain View.
Still family owned and it feels like it!

detailedReviews.author: Janette Kingston
detailedReviews.text:
I have not been to this place in over 5 years but I came back today, and I cannot understand how you can mess a regular pepperoni pizza up. It was full of cheese, very greasy, and literally no flavor, I couldnt taste any garlic, no oregano.... nothing! Then I went to go use the bathroom and that was disgusting, this place has clearly not put any effort into remodeling for making these areas clean, it's very outdated but so dirty.
Needless to say $30 is not worth the price of their pizza. It's really sad because I don't think that I will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Danny Varela
detailedReviews.text: Really nice old school restaurant.  A real Santa Clara staple.  Food is excellent and the atmosphere is very casual and fun.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the personal care and family tradition put into the food, which creates lasting memories and a unique taste that stands out. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The restaurant's management and staff go above and beyond to make customers feel like part of the family, providing exceptional service and a welcoming atmosphere. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant offers customizable menu options, such as gluten-free pasta and extra meatballs, to accommodate customer preferences. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and slow service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues related to customer service and food quality - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and outdated facilities - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Debra Reyes
positive.text:
Such a great place! We love the food and service.

I love that there are board games you can play while waiting.

positive.author: Medusa
positive.text: This place is amazing. So beautiful and stunning since the moment you get there, then you taste the food and is another level of deliciousness in every bite. They have great packages and excellent attention. We will definitely come back.

neutral.author: Steve
neutral.text: Got my order slightly wrong. Got 1 cheese. 1 pepperoni slice. End up with 2 pepperoni slices. Daughter didn't get her cheese slice. We had to get McDonald's after for her. But it's ok. The 2 slices were still good as I remember since college. Forgot to tell them I wanted thin crust but. From what I know. This is very old school basic establishment. It's cheese or pepperoni by the slice. The rest is specialty whole pie.

neutral.author: Anna C.
neutral.text:
I have been eating at Tony and Albas since 1993 when they were on Santa Teresa and Blossom Hill and even followed them when they moved to Santa Teresa and Snell. I am a big fan of their lunch special and always order their pesto pizza and Italian salad. Their salad dressing is simple yet delicious and is a very good-sized portion. They have  had to raise their prices like everyone else, but the quality and taste of their pizza are still worthy of today's  prices. Over the years, I have been treated extremely well by the staff and never had a complaint. Until, my last visit when I was not treated very well at all.
There was a large group in front of me who were talking their time, deciding what to order, so I sat down  at a table where I was told by a male staff member that I could not sit at a table till I placed my order.  I have a non visible injury, which makes it hard to stand long periods of time. If this is a new policy that they have implemented, I can respect it if it is posted. I felt singled out and  mistreated and was embarrassed. I will not eat there again for how badly I was treated.
I can honestly say their food is good, but the customer service that day was sub-par, considering what a long-time customer I have been.

negative.author: Anthony K.R.
negative.text: 3 stars would be too generous. Food isn‚Äôt that good. You can definitely find better pasta and pizza elsewhere, and at much better prices.

negative.author: G EE
negative.text: They took 10 minutes to help 2 customers ahead of me and told me it will be a few minutes for 2 slices of pizza after 20 minutes when I asked them my order was sitting there. Slices were cold and dry when i got back in my car

negative.author: MICROSOFT G
negative.text: Not Italian food, very bland and not fresh

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
